node.title: Block Tag Sensor
node.excerpt: Add a component to an entity to trigger an event when one or more tags are detected in a block at a defined location

node.title: Coffee Theme
node.excerpt: Adds a coffee theme to select inside the settings window, additionally replacing some navigation icons. Caffeine not included.

node.title: Basic Animated Background-Theme
node.excerpt: This theme uses properties never used before to create a really awesome looking animated background to level up your bridge. experience. For Dark Theme users ONLY.

node.title: Violet Magic Theme
node.excerpt: Adds a nice looking theme to bridge (looks better in dark theme)

node.title: Volcanic and Aquatic Themes
node.excerpt: Adds two new volcanic and aquatic color themes to select inside the settings window

node.title: More Vanilla Entity Presets
node.excerpt: Adds a cod, salmon and bat preset.

node.title: Json Encoder
node.excerpt: Encodes your json files into utf-16.
